titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the ceiling on the sum of the annual deductible and the other annual out-of-pocket expenses required to be paid under a high deductible health plan.
Keeping HSAs Accessible Act of 2019
Keeping HSAs Accessible Act of 2019
Keeping HSAs Accessible Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Keeping HSAs Accessible Act of 2019
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the ceiling on the sum of the annual deductible and out-of-pocket expenses required under a high deductible health plan (i.e., $5,000 for self-only coverage and twice that amount for family coverage), for purposes of health saving account eligibility.
